prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon that dances joyfully in the sunshine.
Generate a vibrant flying-type Pokemon with yellow feathers and colorful pom-poms.
Design a cheerful Pokemon that loves to perform and entertain in parks.
Imagine a Pokemon with a playful spirit and a knack for singing beautiful songs.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies happiness and spreads joy wherever it goes.
Make a unique flying-type Pokemon that is known for its energetic and lively personality.
Give me a whimsical creature that dances gracefully on one leg while holding colorful accessories.
